title: Ohtani's 3 HRs, 10-K gem lift L.A. to NLCS sweep
content: Shohei Ohtani has propelled the Los Angeles Dodgers back to the World Series with a two-way performance for the ages.

title: Louisville's 'great plan' rattles Beck, No. 2 Miami
content: Louisville intercepted four of Carson Beck's passes and the Cardinals shocked the No. 2 Hurricanes 24-21 on Friday night.

title: Suárez's clutch slam leaves M's one win from WS
content: Eugenio Suárez hit a go-ahead grand slam after Cal Raleigh's tying drive in a five-run eighth inning, giving the Seattle Mariners a 6-2 win over the Toronto Blue Jays and a 3-2 American League Championship Series lead.

title: Springer hurt on HBP; Schneider calls out fan boos
content: Blue Jays designated hitter George Springer left Game 5 of the ALCS after getting hit by a pitch on his right kneecap in the seventh inning Friday at Seattle. X-rays were negative, according to manager John Schneider.

title: 76ers' Embiid, out nearly 8 months, sees action
content: Joel Embiid started for the 76ers in their preseason finale Friday night, his first game action in nearly eight months.

title: Ovechkin gets 898th goal, Caps win 4th straight
content: Alex Ovechkin scored for the first time this season, notching his 898th career goal in Washington's 5-1 win over Minnesota.

title: NFL Films' deleted Branch video draws Lions' ire
content: Lions players took offense to an NFL Films video that was released, then deleted, on social media involving suspended safety Brian Branch, claiming it was overly critical.

title: LaLiga players pause game to protest Miami match
content: LaLiga players launched protests against the league's decision to stage a regular-season game in Miami by pausing play for the opening seconds after kickoff.

title: Ready for another wild weekend? The 32 games that demand your attention
content: Ole Miss-Georgia, Bama-Tennessee, LSU-Vandy, plus USC-Notre Dame and more make for a jam-packed weekend.

title: Our guide to every Week 7 NFL game: Matchup previews, predictions, picks and nuggets
content: Offense showdown in Bucs-Lions? Who wins Jayden Daniels vs. Dak Prescott? We have picks, predictions, storylines and stat nuggets for every Week 7 game.

title: The NHL's small-sample shock teams: Who has under- and overperformed?
content: We explore what has happened (good or bad) for seven particular teams -- and predict whether it'll continue.

title: 'There's no Steph without Steve': Steph Curry and Steve Kerr reflect on 11 seasons together
content: As Curry and Kerr enter their 12th season together, they reflect on what forged their bond and what comes next.

title: 'Change is a must': WNBA owners, insiders on Cathy Engelbert, officiating, CBA
content: Have owners and executives lost faith in the WNBA commissioner? We canvassed insiders on the biggest topics at the WNBA Finals.

title: Can Dortmund keep pace with Bayern? We're about to find out
content: Perfect Bayern, unbeaten Dortmund, first vs. second: Der Klassiker doesn't need extra fanfare. This is a meeting of the best in the Bundesliga.

title: The Bush Push revisited: A time capsule of the iconic Notre Dame-USC matchup, 20 years later
content: The Bush Push was more than just an iconic moment in the USC-Notre Dame rivalry -- its aftershocks affected both teams, the 2005 postseason and the rulebook.

title: Don't be surprised if ... Jaxon Smith-Njigba hits 2K, TreVeyon Henderson breaks out
content: Will Seattle's star receiver can keep up his impressive pace? Is a breakout game ahead for a Patriots rookie?

title: Fantasy Football Buzz: What extreme weather means for Dolphins, Browns starters
content: With extreme gusts expected for Dolphins-Browns on Sunday, how does the weather affect the game plan?

title: The NFL trade deadline dream scenario: Barnwell proposes 13 trades that need to happen
content: Jakobi Meyers to the NFC East? Trey Hendrickson and Jaelan Phillips to the same team? Russell Wilson to a contender? Let's build 13 win-win trades.

title: Which teams benefitted most from the transfer portal -- or didn't?
content: Which programs over- or underperformed in the portal ahead of the 2025-26 season based on previous cycles?

title: Expert picks, best bets: Can Reinier de Ridder continue his 2025 win streak?
content: ESPN MMA experts make their predictions and give betting tips for UFC Fight Night from Vancouver, British Columbia.

title: Florida's throwbacks, Oregon's all-white look lead Week 8 college football uniforms
content: Multiple teams are rocking throwbacks in Week 8 of the college football season, led by the Florida Gators.

title: Are Man United too big to fail? The answer might surprise you
content: Where do you begin with fixing Man United? From coaching to player identification to infrastructure, what's the first place to start? We asked some industry insiders and experts for their takes.

title: Transfer rumors, news: Liverpool eye Dortmund center back Nico Schlotterbeck
content: Liverpool are prepared to pursue Borussia Dortmund center back Nico Schlotterbeck. Transfer Talk has the latest news and rumors.

title: Talent, emotional intelligence and a lifetime of sacrifice have made Oscar Piastri a F1 title favorite
content: There's no doubting Oscar Piastri's talent, but what's set him apart in his F1 title quest is his ability to control his emotions.

title: Week 7 betting guide: Saquon comes to life, Josh Jacobs keeps rolling
content: Our experts dive into the lines and player props that offer value for Week 7 and share their tips and bets.

title: Three Afghan cricketers killed in attack on Pak border; Rashid Khan breaks down
content: Afghanistan has withdrawn from a tri-nation series with Pakistan and Sri Lanka after three local cricketers were killed in an attack. The Afghanistan Cricket Board identified the victims and stated the attack was carried out by the Pakistani regime. The decision to withdraw is a gesture of respect to the victims.

title: Trump's 100% tariff: US and China seek fresh trade talks 'as soon as possible'
content: China and the US are set to resume trade talks soon, aiming to de-escalate escalating tariff tensions. This comes after US President Trump suggested a 100% tariff might not be sustainable, while also hinting at potential further levies. The discussions follow recent export controls by Beijing and mixed signals from both economic powers.

title: 'I pray for everyone's happiness, prosperity & health': PM wishes nation on Dhanteras
content: Prime Minister Narendra Modi and other dignitaries on Saturday extended heartfelt Dhanteras greetings to citizens, praying for happiness, prosperity, and good health. Leaders emphasised the significance of the festival, linking it to wealth, health, and the birth anniversary of Lord Dhanvantari, while also urging for environmental protection and social harmony.

title: Upset Nvidia CEO Jensen Huang says: Our market share has fallen to Zero from 95% in ...
content: Nvidia's advanced AI chip dominance in China has evaporated, dropping to zero due to US export controls. CEO Jensen Huang revealed the company is completely barred from selling high-performance chips, warning this exclusion harms both nations and cedes the market to domestic rivals like Huawei.  China's push for self-sufficiency accelerates this shift.

title: 'Will take time': UN issues warning on Gaza famine; urges opening of crossings
content: The UN warns that ending the Gaza famine requires time and opening all crossings to flood the region with food. Nearly 3,000 tonnes of food have arrived since a ceasefire, with the World Food Programme scaling up aid.  More distribution points and bakeries are planned, but urgent calls persist for unimpeded access to save lives.

title: Happy Dhanteras 2025: 110 best wishes, messages and quotes to share with loved ones
content: Diwali, the Festival of Lights, symbolizes the triumph of good over evil and light over darkness. The five-day celebration begins with Dhanteras, honoring Lord Dhanvantari and marking the start of prosperity. This year, Dhanteras falls on October 17, 2025, ushering in a period of auspicious beginnings and blessings.

title: Halloween horror in Virginia: Masked trio tries to break into home - video
content: Three masked individuals, dressed as Michael Myers, a clown, and a nun, terrorized a widow's home in Alexandria, Virginia, on Halloween night.  The intruders threatened to kill the occupants and attempted to break in, forcing the family to fear for their safety. Police are investigating the serious incident, which is being compared to 'The Purge'.

title: Bezos' ex-wife cuts Amazon share; Slashes stake by $12.6bn; Increases charity
content: MacKenzie Scott has significantly reduced her Amazon stake, cutting holdings by nearly 42% to $12.6 billion. This reduction occurred despite Amazon's stock performance and follows her extensive philanthropic efforts, which have heavily focused on diversity, equity, and inclusion initiatives. The exact reasons for the stake reduction, whether sales or donations, remain unspecified.

title: 'Cowardly attack by Pak': ACB mourns loss of 3 players; withdraws from Tri-Nation series
content: Three Afghan cricketers, Kabeer, Sibghatullah, and Haroon, were tragically killed in an attack in Paktika province. The Afghanistan Cricket Board blamed the "Pakistani regime" for the "cowardly attack." In response, Afghanistan has withdrawn from an upcoming T20I series against Pakistan. Captain Rashid Khan condemned the incident, calling it "immoral and barbaric."

title: 'India won't be buying Russian oil': Trump doubles down on claim, despite MEA's fact-check
content: US President Donald Trump asserted India would cease buying Russian oil, a claim swiftly refuted by New Delhi. The Ministry of External Affairs clarified no recent calls occurred between Prime Minister Modi and President Trump, with their last official communication being on October 9. India continues to defend its energy imports based on national interest and security.

title: ScaleAl lays off an entire team; then invites employees to..
content: Scale AI has disbanded its Dallas-based New Projects Organization, a team of contractors focused on general AI chatbot improvement. This move, following a significant Meta investment, signals an industry pivot towards specialized, expert-level AI training in fields like medicine and robotics.  Affected workers received severance and were offered opportunities on Scale's gig platform.

title: 'ODI captaincy bhi mil sakti thi mujhe': Suryakumar spills the beans on ambition
content: Suryakumar Yadav, fresh off leading India to the Asia Cup title, revealed his past aspirations for ODI captaincy. He believes a stronger ODI performance could have opened doors, and despite Shubman Gill now leading in ODIs, Surya hasn't entirely given up on the dream. He's set to captain India in an upcoming T20I series against Australia.

title: Bengaluru college rape: Accused student had offered to bring pill
content: A 21-year-old engineering student was arrested and suspended for allegedly raping his senior in a college washroom. The survivor filed a complaint five days after the October 10 incident, leading to the accused's arrest and judicial custody. College authorities confirmed forming a committee to inquire into the matter.

title: 'Like a movie': US cop saves drunk woman from a fiery car crash
content: A Mesquite police officer, Tyler Ingram, heroically rescued a suspected drunk driver from her burning car on I-30. Bodycam footage captured Ingram forcing open the door and pulling the woman to safety moments before the vehicle was engulfed in flames. The woman, who sustained injuries, is expected to recover and faces DWI charges.

title: NBA trade rumors: Warriors eye $186M bucks star for big 3 with Curry, Butler
content: Golden State Warriors are reportedly considering a seismic trade, sending Draymond Green and other assets to Milwaukee for superstar Giannis Antetokounmpo. This bold move could redefine the franchise's future, potentially extending their championship window beyond the Stephen Curry era. The proposed deal offers a chance for a new era, balancing loyalty with a pursuit of generational talent.

title: Brewers ‘Karen’ fired after racist rant video IDs her as Shannon Kobylarczyk
content: A Wisconsin woman, Shannon Kobylarczyk, faced swift repercussions after a viral video captured her racist tirade against a U.S. war veteran at a baseball game. Her employer, ManPowerGroup, terminated her employment, and she resigned from the Make-A-Wish Foundation board. The incident highlights the rapid online response to displays of hate.

title: George Kittle injury update: 49ers TE set for Week 7 return amid re-injury risk
content: San Francisco Forty-niners star George Kittle is nearing a return after a hamstring injury. He is expected to play in Week 7 against the Atlanta Falcons. Kittle's presence is anticipated to boost the Forty-niners' offense. Medical experts note a risk of re-injury but Kittle himself is eager to rejoin the team.

title: 'Might give him a call': Ajit Agarkar breaks silence on Md Shami controversy; what he said
content: BCCI chief selector Ajit Agarkar addressed Mohammed Shami's criticism regarding his exclusion from the Australia white-ball tour. Agarkar stated that Shami's fitness was the primary concern, citing his inability to participate in the England tour. He emphasised that Shami's availability for the Ranji Trophy would be monitored, and if fit, he remains a valuable asset.

title: Dhanteras 2025: 5 things to buy for good luck, and 3 things to avoid bringing home this day
content: Dhanteras, the auspicious start to Diwali, calls for mindful shopping. Experts suggest buying gold, silver, new utensils, and idols of Goddess Lakshmi and Lord Ganesh to invite prosperity. Conversely, avoid sharp objects, iron items, and anything broken, as these are believed to attract negative energy and hinder good fortune. Embrace the festive spirit with wise choices.

title: Cardi B opens up on heartbreak and pain ahead of parenthood with Stefon Diggs
content: Cardi B is preparing to welcome a child with Stefon Diggs while still legally married to ex-husband Offset. She recently revealed on Jay Shetty's podcast that she felt their marriage was dying and she chose to be lonely. Offset has since admitted to cheating during their marriage, which Cardi B announced her separation from in October 2024.

title: Adam Sandler won’t join Turning Point USA’s Super Bowl event
content: A viral rumor claiming Adam Sandler would perform at Turning Point USA's halftime show has been debunked.  Misleading social media posts, amplified by manipulated graphics, falsely linked the comedian to Lara Trump's event.  Sources confirm Sandler remains focused on his comedy and film projects, with no political ties to the organization.

title: 'Continued accusations about me': Prince Andrew gives up his royal titles and honours
content: Prince Andrew has relinquished his Duke of York title amidst ongoing criticism over his associations with Jeffrey Epstein and a business associate suspected of being a Chinese spy. He stated his decision was to avoid distracting from King Charles's work and the wider royal family.

title: 'Jiya ho bihar ke lala': Vaibhav Suryavanshi's gesture to fans in Patna wins hearts—Watch
content: Teenage sensation Vaibhav Suryavanshi continues to captivate cricket fans, drawing massive crowds wherever he plays. Despite a modest score in Bihar's recent Ranji Trophy win, the 14-year-old prodigy, who also holds an IPL contract and an IPL century record, acknowledged his adoring supporters. Bihar is banking on his talent for a comeback.

title: 'He looks beautiful': Trump gives thumps up to Zelenskyy's outfit — Watch
content: President Trump praised Ukrainian President Zelenskyy's stylish dark suit during their White House meeting, a stark contrast to his earlier teasing of Zelenskyy's military attire. The discussion focused on Ukraine's request for Tomahawk missiles, while Trump also announced plans for a second summit with Russian President Putin.

title: Justin Herbert and Madison Beer: 2025’s hottest new couple stuns fans
content: NFL star Justin Herbert and pop sensation Madison Beer are the talk of 2025. Their romance, sparked by sightings and confirmed with a sideline kiss at a Chargers game, blends sports and entertainment. Beer's evolving style, from glamorous stage wear to chic off-duty looks, further fuels fan fascination with this high-profile couple.

title: World Cup: Hussain warns England - 'To beat India, you cannot rely on ...'
content: Former England captain Nasser Hussain believes India must embrace an aggressive mindset against England in their crucial World Cup clash. He highlighted England's bowling strength but urged their batters for collective effort. Hussain stressed India's need to convert close games into wins, drawing belief from their earlier series triumph over England.

title: 'This energy is irresistible': Taylor Swift and Travis Kelce’s unseen moment melts fans
content: Taylor Swift and Travis Kelce's engagement is generating buzz, especially after a touching moment in a new docuseries trailer. Fans are comparing Kelce's public affection to Swift's private past relationship, praising his supportive presence. While wedding details remain under wraps, speculation points to a lavish summer 2026 ceremony, fueling anticipation for the couple's next chapter.

title: Delhi-Dhaka spat: Deaths of 3 B'deshis in Tripura sparks tiff; MEA reacts
content: India and Bangladesh are embroiled in a diplomatic dispute following the killing of three Bangladeshis in Tripura. Dhaka condemned the "brutal beating and killing" as a "grave violation of human rights," while India stated the deceased were "smugglers" who attacked villagers. New Delhi urged Dhaka to uphold border sanctity and prevent cross-border crimes.

title: New Melsanthis selected for Sabarimala, Malikappuram temples
content: Selections made through draw of lots from a panel of candidates shortlisted by TDB. Both priests will assume charge on November 15, on the eve of the annual Mandala-Makaravilakku pilgrimage season

title: Heavy rain batters Kerala’s Idukki; Mullaperiyar dam shutters opened as water levels rise
content: Peerumade and Udumbanchola taluks witness isolated incidents of mudslides and minor landslips. Heavy rain at Kumily and Nedumkandam floods several houses

title: YSRCP leader Amarnath accuses Lokesh of resorting to personal attacks
content: The YSRCP leader questions the government’s decision to offer concessions worth ₹22,000 crore to Google for the data centre project, without explaining the concrete benefits Visakhapatnam would reap

title: Toil behind sweet success of ‘Atreyapuram Putharekulu’ from A.P.
content: A delicacy local to the Godavari region earns global recognition for its traditional and unique taste. The culinary art behind the sweet is preserved mostly by the women of Atreyapuram mandal, who work tirelessly to earn around ₹1,000 per day

title: Bihar Assembly election LIVE: Over 1,250 file nominations for 1st phase of polls; NDA confident, INDIA bloc in disarray
content: Jharkhand Minister Sudivya Kumar Sonu said he has informed RJD leader Tejashwi Yadav about the seats the JMM is keen to contest in the Bihar elections

title: Two dead, 4 seriously injured in blast at shipyard in south Goa
content: The exact cause of the blast is yet to be ascertained, but witnesses have claimed the explosion happened in a room in the ship where welding work was underway, says an official

title: J&K Govt. move to end RBA category will dilute Kashmiri representation: PDP’s Waheed Parra
content: Parra said the J&K government’s decision to alter the reservation policy was an act of political manipulation.

title: CM Mamata clarifies on outsiders remark, says referred to a party, not people
content: West Bengal Chief Minister Mamata Banerjee alleged that Bhabanipur, the Assembly seat she has been representing, was being filled by ‘bohiragoto (outsiders)‘ in a planned manner.

title: 13 of 17 State-run universities soon to have regular VCs, says Odisha Governor
content: Odisha Governor Hari Babu Kambhampati expresses concern over large vacancies in higher education institutes

title: The murky deaths in the Haryana Police
content: On October 7, an IPS officer from Haryana, Y. Puran Kumar, was found dead in Chandigarh. In a note supposedly written by him, Puran alleged caste-based discrimination by fellow officers. His death came a day after his personal security officer, Sushil Kumar, was booked in an extortion case. Days later, an Assistant Sub Inspector, Sandeep Lather, involved in Sushil’s arrest was also found dead. Vikas Vasudeva and Ashok Kumar report on the case

title: Three murder accused from Rajasthan held in Kolkata; one remains absconding
content: The three men are now in police custody and pending formal handover to the Rajasthan Police for further investigation

title: RJD leader contesting on Congress ticket from Jale seat in Bihar
content: Mishra, a party-hopper who had won Jale seat on JD(U) ticket in a by-election in 2014, comes from a well-known political family of Bihar.

title: Project to support children of incarcerated persons launched in Kannur
content: SPRUHA Plus targets children aged between eight and 18 years, offering holistic care through legal, emotional, and educational support

title: Congress seeks ban on ABVP for alleged violence on campus
content: The NSUI president cited an incident at Delhi University’s B.R. Ambedkar College, where a woman ABVP office-bearer allegedly slapped a professor

title: Day not far when India will be totally free of Maoism: PM Modi
content: With 303 Maoists having surrendered in the past 75 hours and their grip restricted to only three districts in the country, the PM says “areas that were affected by Naxalism will celebrate Diwali for the first time in 60-70 years”.

title: Tamil Nadu leads the country in revenue generated from prison products; over ₹67 cr. collected
content: The State pays ₹300 for skilled workers and ₹270 for semi-skilled workers per day; products, such as ready-made garments, leather shoes, raincoats, and bakery items, are sold under the brand name ‘Freedom’; prisoners are allowed to pursue degrees and diplomas offered by Tamil Nadu Open University

title:
INDIA muddle: RJD, Congress, and VIP in ‘friendly fight’
in seven constituencies
content: While no party, except the Congress, has released its candidate list amid dragging seat-sharing talks, many have filed their nominations on the last day for the first phase of the election. VIP chief Mukesh Sahani announces that he is not contesting the upcoming Bihar Assembly elections.

title: Hotels association moots international consulates, tourism hub at Rushikonda
content: Andhra Pradesh Star Hotels Association recommends a PPP-based luxury resort and business consulate complex in Visakhapatnam, while Jana Vignana Vedika suggests a science and cultural museum as an alternative

title: Social media influencer Manish Kasyap to contest from Bihar's Chanpatia seat on Jan Suraaj ticket
content: The YouTuber was arrested in 2023 by Tamil Nadu Police for allegedly spreading misinformation regarding attacks on Bihar's migrants

title: Adapt to emerging technologies, students urged
content: RGUKT–Andhra Dean Sravani Duvvuri highlights the growing role of quantum technologies while inaugurating “OMNITRIX 2025” hackathon at Siddhartha Academy

title: Supreme Court quashes multiple FIRs under Uttar Pradesh Act on religious conversion, says law not tool to harass innocents
content: Justice Pardiwala found that the FIRs were vitiated by legal infirmities, procedural lapses, and lack of credible material

title: LeBron James trolled after billionaire star defends his stance on protecting money
content: NBA icon LeBron James, now a billionaire, revealed on his wife's podcast that he threatened his financial advisor to prevent any financial mismanagement. This confession sparked backlash from fans on social media, who criticized his approach and intelligence. James also discussed his entrepreneurial risks and being a first-generation wealth creator.

title: Rohit reveals 2027 ODI WC future in viral video - Watch
content: Rohit Sharma has confirmed his intention to play in the 2027 ODI World Cup, aiming to finally lift the coveted trophy.  The veteran opener, who recently retired from T20Is, is focusing on fitness for the upcoming Australia series.  Despite Shubman Gill's appointment as ODI captain, Rohit and Virat Kohli remain key figures, offering invaluable experience for the team's future.

title: Two students diagnosed with mild jaundice, one with malaria in Saluru residential schools
content: Health condition of students across residential institutions in Saluru mandal remains stable, say officials adding over 2,900 screened as precautionary measure against seasonal fevers

title: Tamil Nadu Assembly rejects the Governor’s observations, readopts Tamil Nadu Fiscal Responsibility (Amendment) Bill, 2024
content: The Bill seeks to postpone the achievement of zero revenue deficit and 3% fiscal deficit by another year, R.N. Ravi said while returning the Bill

title: IAS, IPS officers’ interim applications for vacating stay over Nagaram lands dismissed
content: Petitioner contends that the said lands actually belonged to the Bhoodan Yajna Board and were purchased by private persons, and these transactions required an investigation by the Enforcement Directorate

title: Supreme Court raps Centre, States for ‘gross apathy’ over opportunities for transgender persons
content: Bench of the top court forms a committee headed by former Delhi High Court judge Justice Asha Menon to draft an equal opportunity policy for transgender persons

title: Bhojpuri actors add star power to Bihar poll contest
content: Popular personalities like Pawan Singh, Manoj Tiwari, Ravi Kishan, and Dinesh Lal Yadav ‘Nirahua’ feature prominently in the BJP’s list of 40 star campaigners.

title: Embraer inaugurates India office, signs agreement with Mahindra group to develop a hub for C-390 military transport aircraft
content: Embraer also plans to build capacity in India to capitalise on opportunities within the country’s aerospace and defense industry

title: Resolution of Palestinian question necessary for India-Middle East-Europe-Economic Corridor: Egyptian FM
content: In Delhi for the first India-Egypt Strategic Dialogue, Abdelatty urges India to join the Egyptian Suez Canal Economic Zone; meets Jaishankar, calls on PM Modi; IMEC project, unveiled at the G-20 Summit in 2023, stalled soon after due to Gaza war

title: Madras High Court CJ to take a call on listing cases related to framing of guidelines for political rallies
content: His Division Bench directs the Registry to place the matter before him, on the administrative side, for issuing necessary instructions

title: Rotavirus vaccine effective against gastroenteritis in children: study
content: In 2016, India introduced Rotavac, an indigenous oral rotavirus vaccine, administered at 6, 10 and 14 weeks of age, in its Universal Immunisation Programme. When a vaccine is introduced in the UIP, it is provided free to all eligible beneficiaries.

title: Just a few candidates for a population of 17.7%: Muslims still get short shrift
content: BJP has not fielded any Muslims, while Congress and Janata Dal(U) have named four and LJP(RV) one; Prashant Kishor’s Jan Suraaj Party promised to field 40 and named 21; the Muslim population is over 20% in 87 constituencies, and about 75% of the community in the State live in northern Bihar

title: Commence recruitment immediately, Santosh Hegde tells State govt.
content: Santosh Hegde says that it is unfortunate that the State government is not considering the problem of unemployment seriously

title: A.P. Police arrest two persons from U.P., Maharashtra for terror links
content: They are found to be active members of WhatsApp groups and channels of Jaish-e-Mohammed and were planning to radicalise youth and also take military training in Pakistan to wage a war against India, says SP

title: Contractors’ association gives December deadline to government to clear pending bills
content: Karnataka State Contractors Association has warned that it will release the ‘corruption report card’ of the government in December, if the pending amount of ₹33,000 crore

title: Villagers ‘resisted’ smugglers from Bangladesh, says India after Dhaka condemns death of Bangladesh citizens in Tripura
content: Ministry of External Affairs spokesperson says incident highlights need for Bangladesh to undertake necessary measures to uphold sanctity of the international border

title: Tamil Nadu government announces holiday on October 21
content: The State government has taken the decision considering the convenience of students, teachers, and government employees to return from their natives after Deepavali

title: Adi Karmayogi initiative helping Adivasis think and speak for themselves: President Murmu at National Conclave
content: At National Conclave in New Delhi, President says the government aims to build self-reliance and participation among tribal communities through the programme

title: Rahul Gandhi meets lynching victim’s kin in Uttar Pradesh, vows to stand with family, every exploited citizen
content: The brutal murder of Hariom Valmiki has shaken the conscience of the entire nation, says the Congress leader

title: IIM Kozhikode, Bharat Electronics company sign pact
content: IIM-K and BEL sign MoU for leadership development programs to enhance management expertise and business acumen

title: Cyber police nab Kozhikode trio for alleged role in ₹25-crore fraud
content: The trio’s arrest comes a month after a woman from Kollam, Sujitha G., was arrested in the case; as many as 250 SIM cards, 40 mobile phones, laptops, and debit cards seized from a flat used by the accused

title: Centre fined for concealing facts in NCB officer Sameer Wankhede case
content: Delhi High Court said it expected that the Centre would disclose all the facts truthfully before filing the plea

title: Andhra Pradesh government introduces new performance evaluation model for Health Department
content: Health Minister Satya Kumar asks department heads to self-assess their performance for the first six months of the current financial year and submit a detailed feedback based on 20 key parameters, the aim of which is to ensure accountability and measurable progress in public health services

title: Petitioners disappointed at HC decision to lift toll collection ban at Paliyekkara
content: Petitioners plan to explore scope of moving Supreme Court and say suspension period had been “a lesson” for both the National Highways Authority of India and the contractor. The order came even as the Thrissur-Angamaly stretch of the NH continues to witness heavy congestion

title: BJP MLA’s remarks on Hindu girls and gyms draw sharp criticism
content: Gopichand Padalkar’s comments in Beed spark outrage; accused of promoting communal division and moral policing

title: Belgium court delivers judgment in favour of extraditing Mehul Choksi in CBI case
content: “The prosecutors told the court that he remains a flight risk and cannot be released from prison,” officials said.

title: 2025 local body polls: reservation wards in Thiruvananthapuram Corporation finalised
content: Kattayikonam, Pangappara, Attukal, Alathara and Kulathur are the SC Women reservation wards and Kachani, Peroorkada, Arannur and Cheruvaickal, the SC reservation wards

title: ‘Use AI as a support tool, rigorous verification a hallmark of journalism’
content: Warning against fake news, Adviser to Government K. Keshava Rao urged journalists to maintain accuracy, authenticity, and ethical standards while using AI as a supportive tool in news gathering

title: Congress leaders in Kerala find revamped PAC unwieldy
content: Many leaders feel that the oversized political affairs committee, which now has 39 members, does not inspire confidence. They resent that those in key positions in the Central leadership are eager to induct their loyalists instead of forming a lean body of leaders with political heft. Some leaders are planning to raise the issue with the party high command

title: Donald Trump Claims Afghan-Pak Conflict Would Be "Easy" To Solve: "Will Be Number 9"
content: US President Donald Trump has doubled down on his claim of "solving" eight wars and indicated that brokering peace between warring Pakistan and Afghanistan would be his next goal.

title: Venezuela's Maduro Doesn't Want To F*** Around With US: Donald Trump
content: US President Donald Trump unleashed a four-letter broadside at Venezuelan leader Nicolas Maduro on Friday, as he said the leftist strongman had offered major concessions to ease tensions with Washington.

title: Royalty To Rape Accusation: The Downfall Of Prince Andrew
content: Once widely reputed to be Queen Elizabeth's favourite son and feted as a dashing young military officer, Britain's Prince Andrew will now always be seen in the public eye as the royal who was accused of sexually abusing a teenage girl.

title: 3 Afghan Cricketers Among 8 Dead In Pakistani Airstrike Near Border
content: At least three Afghanistani cricketers have been killed in a Pakistani airstrike in Paktika province.

title: Israel Receives Coffin As Part Of Truce, Dead Hostage Yet To Be Identified
content: Israel received the remains of another hostage from Gaza on Friday, the prime minister's office said, a handover from Hamas as the group worked to shore up a ceasefire by using bulldozers in a search for bodies under the rubble in the enclave.

title: 'Enough Bloodshed': Trump Calls To End Ukraine War After Meeting Zelensky
content: President Donald Trump hosted Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelensky for talks at the White House Friday, and afterward Trump took to social media to call for Kyiv and Moscow to "stop where they are" and end the war.

title: "Broken Ceasefire": Senior Taliban Official On Pak's Airstrikes In Afghanistan
content: The 48-hour truce between Afghanistan and Pakistan paused nearly a week of bloody border clashes that killed dozens of troops and civilians on both sides.

title: NDTV World Summit 2025 LIVE: Biggest Global Names Set To Converge On Day 2
content: NDTV Global World Summit 2025 LIVE Updates: The 2025 edition of the NDTV World Summit - NDTV's flagship event - began on Friday, with Prime Minister Narendra Modi delivering the keynote address.

title: Yusuf Pathan Visits Bengal's Adina Mosque, BJP Calls It Adinath Temple
content: Trinamool Congress MP and former cricketer Yusuf Pathan posted photos from his visit to the Adina Mosque in West Bengal's Malda.

title: Trump Commutes Sentence Of Former Republican George Santos In Fraud Case
content: US President Trump commuted the sentence of disgraced former Republican lawmaker George Santos, who was convicted of committing wire fraud and identity theft to splurge on lavish vacations and Botox injections with funds stolen from campaign donors.

title: Trump Again Claims India Will Soon Stop Buying Russian Oil
content: US President Donald Trump on Friday reiterated his claim that India has "de-escalated" on buying Russian oil, as he met his Ukrainian counterpart Volodymyr Zelensky at the White House.

title: UK's Prince Andrew Gives Up Royal Title Over Alleged Links To Jeffrey Epstein
content: The UK's Prince Andrew on Friday renounced his title of Duke of York under pressure from his brother King Charles, amid further revelations about his ties to US sex offender Jeffrey Epstein.

title: Mango Founder's Son Under Scrutiny As Police Probe Death Of Fashion Tycoon Last Year
content: Spanish police confirmed Friday that their probe into the sudden death last year of Mango clothing empire founder Isak Andic remains open following reports his...

title: Hamas Aims To Keep Grip On Gaza Security, Can't Commit To Disarm, Says Senior Official
content: Hamas intends to maintain security control in Gaza during an interim period, a senior Hamas official told Reuters, adding he could not commit to the group disarming - positions that reflect the difficulties facing US plans to secure an end to the war

title: 2 Killed In Stampede In Kenya At Funeral For Ex-PM
content: Two people died and dozens were injured in a stampede at the state funeral of Kenya's revered opposition leader Raila Odinga on Friday as crowds rushed to see his coffin, Doctors Without Borders said.

title: What HAL Chief Test Pilot Told NDTV After Flying New LCA Tejas Mark 1A
content: Defence Minister Rajnath Singh flagged off the first Light Combat Aircraft (LCA) Tejas Mk1A on Friday at Hindustan Aeronautics Ltd's (HAL) facility in Maharashtra's Nashik.

title: India To Spend Rs 65,400 Crore On Fighter Jet Engines In Next Decade
content: India expects to spend about Rs 65,400 crore to buy engines for fighter aircraft that are under development until 2035, according to estimates shared on Friday by a defence official who leads the efforts to build a home-grown engine.

title: How India's Solar Firms Are Bypassing US Tariff Blow
content: Indian solar manufacturers have begun recalibrating their supply chains to maintain access to the lucrative United States market and offset higher tariffs, according to executives.

title: 'He Looks Beautiful': Zelensky's 'Very Stylish' Jacket Gets Nod From Trump
content: Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelensky traded his usual military fatigues for a formal black suit as he met US President Donald Trump at the White House on Friday.

title: IndiGo To Buy 30 More Wide-Body A350-900 Aircraft
content: IndiGo on Friday announced a firm order to buy 30 additional A350-900 planes from Airbus as the country's largest airline seeks to have more wide-body aircraft for its international expansion.

title: Priyank Kharge is suffering from RSS phobia, says Siddalinga Swami
content: ‘He should realise that the State has lost a massive Google investment to neighbouring Andhra Pradesh and start focusing on development’

title: ‘Australia keen on partnering with T.N. for innovative water management solutions’
content: Here as part of an Australian delegation, Karlene Maywald, South Australian Water Ambassador, highlights her country’s vast experience in tackling various challenges from scarce rainfall to floods and says want to share this with the State, and Chennai in particular

title: GHMC Commissioner issues notices to waste management agencies for failure to clear garbage and debris
content: A performance review revealed that on October 16, garbage was cleared at only 1,879 of the total 2,532 garbage vulnerable points before the stipulated time

title: Akkai Padmashali becomes first transgender person from Karnataka to be part SC-appointed panel
content: The panel constituted to formulate an equal opportunity policy for the protection of the rights of transgender persons is the first such committee to have representation from the transgender community

title: Any move to ban RSS will be against Constitution, says Santosh Hegde
content: The former Lokayukta has said that any such move by the State government will boomerang as the BJP will ban the Congress when it returns to power in the State

title: Japanese firm Toshiba to invest additional 35 billion yen on Hyderabad, Kawasaki units
content: The investment will be in the power transmission and distribution (T&D) equipment business and comes in the backdrop of accelerating global electricity demand

title: College football: Why Texas Tech-ASU is worth two bets this week
content: the market moves from Colorado State -1.5 to -2.5 . it feels reactionary after the Rams crushed Fresno State . the result was built on turnover luck and fluky short fields . there are lines that overreacted and matchups that look nothing like what the market thinks they are .

title: Mock draft: Betts, Fudd or Miles at No. 1?
content: the WNBA is negotiating a new collective bargaining agreement with the union . the draft lottery, expansion drafts for Toronto and Portland and a mammoth free agency will have to take place before the 2026 draft . five of our top six selections in this mock were eligible to go in the 2025 draft, but all opted to return for a return trip .

title: Flacco finds vintage form as Bengals win battle of 40-something QBs
content: the Bengals beat the Pittsburgh Steelers 33-31 in an AFC North showdown . the Cincinnati Bengals traded for quarterback Joe Flacco . he threw for 342 yards and three touchdowns in the win .

title: Bontemps and Windhorst: The latest intel on the Lakers, Knicks, Rockets and more
content: the deadline for extensions for most eligible players is Monday at 6 p.m. ET . there's a lot of pessimism right now, even by normal standards . a star-studded free agent class in the summer of 2027 could all be available .

title: 2025-26 coaching hot seat, retirement guide
content: bob greene: the tectonic shift that deals and revenue sharing have sparked in college sports has not spared the men's basketball coaching carousel and the hot seat discussion . he says it's now clear that patience is at an all-time low if new hires aren't cutting it after two years, they're likely getting forced out the door or at least under significant pressure .

title: Verstappen takes sprint pole at US Grand Prix
content: Max Verstappen takes top spot in SQ3 to grab pole position . shortened race was 0.071 seconds quicker than his late lap for the race . the two remain free to race, but a collision could open the door for another Vera .

title: Ranking the top 25 college football players midway through the 2025 season
content: a midseason top 25 is supposed to look like a major league baseball all-star team . it's hard to separate the flash in the pan from the real deal . a bunch of players we love didn't make the cut . the good news is that a few of the biggest names don't keep this hot start through December .

title: Premier League re-rank: Arsenal top; Spurs' unsustainable path
content: the premier league's new financial anchoring rule is proposed . it's a random, low-scoring sport where conversion rates fluctuate massively from game to game . there are so many ways you can get out over your skis by drawing too many conclusions before we get to Halloween .

title: Chargers' new 'Charger Power' alternate, Lions' all-black lead NFL Week 7 uniforms
content: it's the first time in franchise history the Chargers will wear a gold jersey . the look is meant to channel the energy and "progressive nature" of the air coryell days . on "Thursday Night Football," the Cincinnati Bengals are hosting their annual "White Bengal" game .

title: Ladakh reimposes restrictions: Gatherings, rallies banned in Leh after police firing

title: Digital arrests: SC asks MHA, CBI to unearth cybercrime syndicates; seeks pan-India action
content: supreme court sought to know from the ministry of home affairs and CBI what pan-India action was required to unearth cybercrime syndicates extorting money from people, especially senior citizens . the order came in a writ petition registered suo motu by SC after a septuagenarian couple alleged fraudsters forced them to part with over Rs 1 crore .

title: Mancha Masjid case: SC rejects 400-yr-old mosque's plea against demolition; cites public interest
content: a temple and commercial and residential properties were demolished for widening a road in Ahmedabad . the suprem court refused to entertain a plea against partial demolition of 400-year-old mancha Masjid, saying the municipality is serving a public purpose . a bench of justices . Surya Kant and Joymalya Bagchi refused to accede to persistence of the . counsel representing Mansa Masjided Trust .

title: Golden age of Sanskrit: How scholarship thrived in colonial rule – Cambridge University reveals
content: new research by Cambridge scholars plans to show that between 1650 and 1800 a golden age of Sanskrit scholarship took place even when Britain was tightening its grip on India . the largely forgotten literary figures and their works are neglected treasures of India’s intellectual achievement, argues the research team .
